title: Lamb and Vegetable Dolmades
ingredients: ['1 packet vacuum-packed vine leaves in brine, about 227g, drained', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 bulb fennel, chopped', '1 red pepper, seeded and diced', '1 green pepper, seeded and diced', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '2 garlic cloves, cut into thin slivers', '150ml (5 fl oz) vegetable stock', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'salt and pepper', 'Lamb and rice filling', '1 onion, finely chopped', '175g (6 oz) lean minced lamb', '1 large courgette, diced', '50g (2 oz) pine nuts', '175g (6 oz) long-grain rice', '2 tbsp chopped fresh mint', '450 ml (15 fl oz) vegetable stock', 'To garnish', 'lemon wedges', 'sprigs of fresh flat-leaf parsley']
